Text: So sorrySally So sorry we havent been able to connect Here I went out and purchased a new spiffy bottom suit shirt with French cuffs spit shinned my shoes new cashmere socks Allen Edmons shoes exquisite tie and bought the finest parfum from Boucheronand here I sit Hopefully this finds you well All my best Geoffrey Mann CEOPresident North America Viviance new education Inc Lafayette Street Suite New York New York Fax Cell Email wwwviviancecom

RE So sorryThursday June is just fine with mei will coordinate with Pattiall the best to mom and dadgeoffrey Original Message From mailto Sent Friday June PM To Subject RE So sorry Sorry for the delay in getting back with you This has been a wild week and a half end of school activities for the children birthdays of both of my daughters and at work a move to a different floor one full day offsite meeting and all of the details around the sale of our intrastate pipeline completed May I have commitments for a business dinner on Wednesday June th moved from the th this week the rescheduling of which had a bearing on my availability next week Patti said that you asked about dinner on Tuesday Wednesday or Thursday Coorindating with the home schedule it looks as if Thursday would be the better evening for dinner if you are still planning to be in Houston I would certainly not want your new attire to go unused I will be leaving the office shortly to drive to Austin th anniversary celebration for my parents Patti will be in this afternoon and I will ask her to talk with you to see if Thursday June works for your schedule Sally Original Message From Geoffrey Mann ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESGeoffreyMannCgmannvivianceEcomEEN NRONcom Sent Wednesday May PM To Beck Sally Subject So sorry Sally So sorry we havent been able to connect Here I went out and purchased a new spiffy bottom suit shirt with French cuffs spit shinned my shoes new cashmere socks Allen Edmons shoes exquisite tie and bought the finest parfum from Boucheronand here I sit Hopefully this finds you well All my best Geoffrey Mann CEOPresident North America Viviance new education Inc Lafayette Street Suite New York New York Fax Cell Email wwwviviancecom

Thursday DinnerSally Just wanted to confirm tomorrow evening dinner Are we still on Wanted to know your preferencewhere to meet I will be at the Hyatt Regency accross the street from Enron Looking forward to it Geoffrey Mann CEOPresident North America Viviance new education Inc Lafayette Street Suite New York New York Fax Cell Email wwwviviancecom
